sets.name: Homing Spider Droid
sets.description:
Attack the Republic forces on Geonosis with the Homing Spider Droid microfighter!

Go on the hunt on planet Geonosis with the heavily armored LEGO® Star Wars Homing Spider Droid microfighter. This amazing small-scale version of the Droid featured in the Star Wars movies has cool detailing, adjustable legs, flick missile and even a mini cockpit for the Battle Droid to sit in. Give the order to take down the Republican forces! Includes a Battle Droid figure with a blaster.

  • Includes a Battle Droid figure with a blaster pistol
  • Features realistic detailing, adjustable legs, flick missile and a mini cockpit for the Battle Droid figure to sit in
  • Move into position and fire the flick missile!
  • Amazing miniature version of the Homing Spider Droid featured in the Star Wars movies!
  • Recreate mini Geonosian battles with the 75076 LEGO® Star Wars Republic Gunship
  • As seen in Star Wars: Episode II Attack of the Clones
  • Measures over 3” (8cm) high, 2” (6cm) long and 3” (9cm) wide
